translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽In the case of the directions in conformity with the ideas and the reverse, the exposition by threes, the text of the exposition by threes
The two-term method, the method in groups of three,

original: Araṇaṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Araṇaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam parittam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  araṇam mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: In the case of a condition that is not a condition of a non-root-cause, a root-cause is a condition for a non-root-cause by root-cause condition. In the case of a root-cause, there is one by root-cause condition, one by non-causality condition, one by root-cause and non-causality conditions.🔽In the case of a condition that is not a condition of a great-great, a great-great is a condition for a non-great-great by root-cause condition. In the case of a great-great, there is one by root-cause condition, one by non-causality condition, one by root-cause and non-causality conditions.

original: Araṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: In the case of a condition that is not a condition of a measureless, a measureless is a condition for a non-measureless by root-cause condition. In the case of a measureless, there is one by root-cause condition, one by non-causality condition, one by root-cause and non-causality conditions.
